body:
Hi Ladan,
if I have understood correctly, you mean how to disable the preview of the building brep. Just right click on brep and set preview off. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HsnN3DaqxRvdU9LSoX0QJnPm0*r8DSScC1dYiIXLeJf0K9NdKM4hVxmm6JJKNdUrEp4h6H-NH6uqhCVFfbwCHBRuEPilcuJn/___A.png) you should enable the preview of wireframe components as you can see below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HsnN3DaqxRscKy6o0KNaZYoJIGZvciXTZpXmh5MKA2ZmI1p4BYlFH-u5tmRQyeh3PddFrBiBPl481qi5S8C9Viuol202XMHq/___.png) Antonello
